about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm Ellie, a graphic designer with a background in several media design industries including 3D animation, film-making & post-production/VFX. My strengths lie in my communication skills and in lateral creative thinking. I'm fascinated with technology and really enjoy figuring out faster, more innovative ways to get things done. I'm a motivated team-player who thrives in a busy collaborative environment, but I am just as happy working on my own. Turning concepts into beautiful designs is my passion.

items.title: South Sea Cruises
items.subtitle: Graphic Designer for NZ and Fiji • Jan 2018 - Present
attributes: Designing assets for printed marketing collateral, online assets and magazine advertisements for a range of brands including: South Sea Cruises Day Cruises, Blue Lagoon Cruises, Awesome Adventures Fiji, Malamala Beach Club, Yasawa Islands Holidays, Vinaka Fiji Volunteering, Occasional work for other partner brands
Creation and use of a variety of die-cuts for use in delivery of packaging design (folded cover inserts, door-hangers, coasters etc)
Co-ordinating and providing finished artwork to various print companies to their print specifications
Setting up functional design workflows to streamline the process from brief to delivery
Developing and recording a thorough understanding of the marketing across all brands including their target demographic, look & feel, brand message & colour pallettes
Creation and maintenence of current brand guideline documents across all brands
Understanding and implimentation of artwork delivery under pre-press specifications for a variety of publishers

items.title: CBRE
items.subtitle: Marketing coordinator, Graphic Designer & Admin • Mar 2017 - Nov 2017
attributes: Maintenece and some design of branded templates
Coordination of Individual Marketing Projects
Advertising Account Coordinating
Administrative support for all the Auckland Marketing teams
Design of marketing collateral for, and helped organise corporate events
Assisted Senior Marketing Manager with the new content management system of the New Zealand website
Assisted training new members in current processes and helping to develop new ones - including designing and creating training documents
Learning, and creating documentation to provide others with, a thorough understanding of individual publisher's pre-press and print specifications/media kits

items.title: Smith & Smith Glass
items.subtitle: CSR, Admin & Booking Specialist • Feb 2016 - Mar 2017
attributes: Responsible for delivering consistent Customer Delight from first contact to booking confirmation
Developed a thorough understanding a wide range of administrative and computer based systems
Scheduled bookings across over 30 Smith and Smith branches nationwide
Also required extensive knowledge of products and systems used by technicians in the field.
Research and pitch project for Environmental initiatie 'Flushwaste' came runner-up

items.title: Vinewood Motion Graphics
items.subtitle: Freelance Creative Artist & Animator • Oct 2015 - Feb 2016
attributes: Worked as a freelance creative artist under creative Phil Brough
Helped out with several time-sensitive, deadline driven projects under NZME including an advertisement for AMI and several episodes of a TV series 'Cul-De-Sac'
Assissted with project pipeline management and some character rigging/animation of a short film project 'Fire In Carboard City'
